item.title: Publication
item.description: 2020 Chao-Chun Hsu, Shantanu Karnwal, Sendhil Mullainathan, Ziad Obermeyer, and Chenhao Tan. Characterizing the Value of Information in Medical Notes. In Findings of EMNLP 2020. Samuel Carton, Anirudh Rathore, and Chenhao Tan. Evaluating and Characterizing Human Rationales. In Fair & Responsible AI Workshop, CHI 2020.
